Please help me fill this display with Raw Boston Doves/Rustlers/Braves (NAT'L) :cool:

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=426932&d=1605889340[/IMG]

My needs are:
Bates
[STRIKE]Beaumont[/STRIKE]
Beck
[STRIKE]Becker[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Bowerman[/STRIKE]
Dahlen
Ferguson
Graham
[STRIKE]Herzog[/STRIKE]
Lindaman
Mattern
Ritchey
[STRIKE]Starr[/STRIKE]
Sweeney


Ideally, I'm looking for raw unaltered cards that would grade around a 1.5-2.5.  I am open to considering any condition of unaltered card... but would prefer not to pay more than $40 for the most common front/back combinations, and would prefer not to have wrinkled faces. 

I obviously would be willing to spend a hair more for Dahlen and any other lower population front/back combinations (I do have a love for Polar Bears...but who doesn't?).

Thanks for your consideration... and proud to be a member of such an awesome community. 

BK

TurkeyDay bump.

Have a Happy Thanksgiving!
BK


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Hey friend / where did you get those holders? Happy Thanksgiving 

Kevin

Hey, Kevin!

Both on Amazon.

Here is the toploader: Ultra Pro 7442784869 Tobacco Top Loader - 25 per Pack [url]https://www.amazon.com/dp/B071SLKSG6/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_apip_J9FC9e9VjrhlL[/url]

And the penny sleeves: BCW Tobacco Card Sleeve [url]https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00VO7VW46/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_apip_3MCrNZgEGhtin[/url]

I’ve been very pleased with both!
